nodes.text: A Munificent-class star frigate of the corporate conglomerate known as the Confederacy of Independent Systems fought in the attack on the flagship of Jedi Master Adi Gallia in the vicinity of the planet Patitite Pattuna circa 21 BBY, during a galactic conflict called the Clone Wars. The starship, together with General Grievous's Providence-class carrier/destroyer and another Munificent-class star frigate, fired on the Jedi's spacecraft, which was destroyed in the engagement.

The Munificent-class star frigate was equipped with armament. It outnumbered the flagship of Jedi Master Adi Gallia when combined with another Munificent-class star frigate and the Providence-class carrier/destroyer of Grievous, a general of an association of commercial organizations, the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

During the Clone Wars—a galactic conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems—around 21 BBY, the Munificent-class star frigate, together with another Munificent-class star frigate and Grievous's Providence-class carrier/destroyer, took part in the attack on Jedi Master Adi Gallia's starship in close proximity to the planet Patitite Pattuna. The frigate and the Jedi's vessel exchanged fire in the engagement and the latter vessel was eventually destroyed.
The starship first appeared unidentified in "Nomad Droids," the sixth episode of season four of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated series that had aired on October 14, 2011.
